notes.title: Here's a Riddle
notes.text:
Double my number, I'm less than a score. Half of my number is less than four. Add one to my double when bakers are near. Days of the week are still greater, I fear.

The answer is 6

notes.title: Leadership Quote
notes.text: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better. - Bill Bradley

notes.title: Shakespeare Quote
notes.text: What's mine is yours and what is yours is mine.  It will make you melancholy, Monsieur Jaques. A miserable world!  As I do live by food, I met a fool, Who laid him down and bask'd him in the sun, And rail'd on Lady Fortune in good terms, In good set terms- and yet a motley fool.
